Object.Field: OdiSendMail "-MAILHOST=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost" "-FROM=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailFrom" "-SUBJECT=Errore interfacce sedApta" "-TO=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailToError" Errore interfacce, verificare la struttura delle interfacce

import sys import smtplib import MimeWriter import base64 import StringIO import javax.activation.MimetypesFileTypeMap as MimetypesFileTypeMap mType = MimetypesFileTypeMap()
sender = smtplib.SMTP('#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost',#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPort)

#Encrypt username and password
user = base64.encodestring('#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailUser').replace("\n","") pswd = base64.encodestring('#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPassword').replace("\n","")
#Initiate Login
sender.putcmd("auth login") reply = sender.getreply() sender.putcmd(user) reply = sender.getreply() sender.putcmd(pswd) reply = sender.getreply()
msg='Errore interfacce, verificare la struttura delle interfacce'

# Write the Subject message = StringIO.StringIO() writer = MimeWriter.MimeWriter(message) writer.addheader('Subject', 'Errore interfacce sedApta'+' - #GLOBAL.GLOBAL_CustomerName') writer.startmultipartbody('mixed')
# Write the Text part = writer.nextpart() textMime='text/html' body = part.startbody(textMime) body.write(msg)
# finish off writer.lastpart()
